description:
We'll have four major levels of ITA (International Tea Academy) certified Tea courses include this one you'll take (Foundation / Intermediate / Milestone / Mastery). The ITA certified tea course - Foundations of Chinese Tea is also available on Udemy right now. After you complete these four level of courses, we'll have a final exam post on the last level (Mastery) on Udemy, after you pass the exam (The exam will be easy if you learning every single levels seriously), you'll achieve the ITA tea courses completion certification.

Anyone in the tea industry or who wants to be in the tea industry will greatly benefit from this course. Whether you are a tea taster, tea lover, tea blogger, tea business owner or you dream of owning a tea business, this course will give you a true insider's knowledge of Chinese tea and international tea industry. It is also crucial to understand where your tea comes from, how it is produced and why it is the way it is. Discover how to support the right kinds of teas from ethical sources. After completing this course, it would be impossible for anyone to take you as a fool again.

This course will cover 5 major part:

1. The Origin of Tea

2. Major Tea Quality Characteristics

3. Tea Evaluation Methods

4. Tea Industry Growth

5. Tea culture and tea with your health

You may only need one month to complete this course, but it will benefit you in whole life. Any one of you will discover a new world within this course, there are those of you who want to start a different lifestyle and want a change, you want to earn a living different way, doing something you enjoy, tea. This course has a profound knowledge of the tea industry and tea culture of China, and will bring into the most special and coolest new healthy living style.
title: ITA certified tea course - Foundations of Chinese Tea
